languages.text: {n}Паскаль поднимает взгляд от инфопластины, подключенной к аугменту. Раньше он был установлен в череп Тарзуса — павшего на вашем корабле техножреца.{/n} "Приношу извинения. Девятнадцать процентов моих вычислительных мощностей задействованы в анализе памяти моего технобрата. Отклик может быть замедлен".

{n}Pasqal raises his eyes from a data-slate connected to an augmetic. The augmetic used to be housed inside the skull of Tarzus, the Tech-Priest who perished on your ship.{/n} "My apologies. Nineteen percent of my processing power is engaged in the analysis of my tech-comrade's memory. My response time may be longer than usual."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль поднимает взгляд от инфопластины, подключенной к аугменту. Раньше он был установлен в череп Тарзуса — павшего на вашем корабле техножреца.{/n} "Приношу извинения. Девятнадцать процентов моих вычислительных мощностей задействованы в анализе памяти моего технобрата. Отклик может быть замедлен".

Nineteen percent of my processing power is engaged in the analysis of my tech-brother's memory. My response time may be longer than usual."

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡抬起头，从数据板上移开了目光。数据板的另一端连接着植入物，这个植入物曾被安置在塔祖斯的头骨里，也就是那位在你的船上丧命的技术神甫。{/n}“很抱歉，我目前19%的处理能力正在用来分析那些技术伙伴的记忆，因此我的反应可能比平时要慢。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal raises his eyes from a data-slate connected to an augmetic. The augmetic used to be housed inside the skull of Tarzus, the Tech-Priest who perished on your ship.{/n} "My apologies. Nineteen percent of my processing power is engaged in the analysis of my tech-comrade's memory. My response time may be longer than usual."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡抬起头，从数据板上移开了目光。数据板的另一端连接着植入物，这个植入物曾被安置在塔祖斯的头骨里，也就是那位在你的船上丧命的技术祭司。{/n}“很抱歉，我目前19%的处理能力正在用来分析那些技术伙伴的记忆，因此我的反应可能比平时要慢。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal levanta la mirada de la tablilla de datos conectada a un aumético. El aumético en cuestión estaba originalmente alojado en la calavera de Tarzus, el tecnosacerdote que murió en tu nave.{/n} «Lo lamento, tengo un diecinueve por ciento de mi poder de procesado ocupado en el análisis de la memoria de mi tecnocamarada. Es posible que mi tiempo de respuesta sea superior al habitual».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal raises his eyes from a data-slate connected to an augmetic. The augmetic used to be housed inside the skull of Tarzus, the Tech-Priest who perished on your ship.{/n} "My apologies. Nineteen percent of my processing power is engaged in the analysis of my tech-comrade's memory. My response time may be longer than usual."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal levanta la mirada de la tablilla de datos conectada a un aumético. El aumético en cuestión estaba originalmente alojado en la calavera de Tarzus, el tecnosacerdote que murió en tu nave.{/n} «Lo lamento, tengo un diecinueve por ciento de mi poder de procesado ocupado en el análisis de la memoria de mi tecnocamarada. Es posible que mi tiempo de respuesta sea superior al habitual».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルがオーグメティックに接続されたデータスレートから目を上げる。オーグメティックは、あなたの船で破滅を迎えた技術司祭であるターザスの頭蓋骨の中に収められていた。{/n}「失礼した。私の処理能力の19%が 技術同胞の記憶の分析に使われているのだ。応答時間は通常より長くなるかもしれぬ」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal raises his eyes from a data-slate connected to an augmetic. The augmetic used to be housed inside the skull of Tarzus, the Tech-Priest who perished on your ship.{/n} "My apologies. Nineteen percent of my processing power is engaged in the analysis of my tech-comrade's memory. My response time may be longer than usual."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルがオーグメティックに接続されたデータスレートから目を上げる。オーグメティックは、あなたの船で破滅を迎えた技術司祭であるターザスの頭蓋骨の中に収められていた。{/n}「失礼した。私の処理能力の19%が 技術同胞の記憶の分析に使われているのだ。応答時間は通常より長くなるかもしれぬ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal hebt den Blick von einem Datablock, der mit einer Augmentierung verbunden ist. Die Augmentierung befand sich früher im Schädel von Tarzus, dem Techpriester, der auf deinem Schiff gestorben ist.{/n} "Verzeiht. Neunzehn Prozent meiner Rechenkraft sind mit der Analyse des Speichers meines Techkameraden beschäftigt. Meine Reaktionszeit mag etwas länger als gewöhnlich sein."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal raises his eyes from a data-slate connected to an augmetic. The augmetic used to be housed inside the skull of Tarzus, the Tech-Priest who perished on your ship.{/n} "My apologies. Nineteen percent of my processing power is engaged in the analysis of my tech-comrade's memory. My response time may be longer than usual."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal hebt den Blick von einem Datablock, der mit einer Augmentierung verbunden ist. Die Augmentierung befand sich früher im Schädel von Tarzus, dem Techpriester, der auf deinem Schiff gestorben ist.{/n} "Verzeiht. Neunzehn Prozent meiner Rechenkraft sind mit der Analyse des Speichers meines Techkameraden beschäftigt. Meine Reaktionszeit mag etwas länger als gewöhnlich sein."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal lève les yeux vers vous, interrompant sa lecture d'une plaque de données reliée à l'augmétique qui se trouvait précédemment dans le crâne de Tarzus, le technoprêtre ayant trouvé la mort sur votre vaisseau.{/n} « Toutes mes excuses. Dix-neuf pour cent de ma capacité de traitement sont actuellement occupés à analyser la mémoire de mon technoconfrère. Mon temps de réponse pourrait être plus long qu'à l'accoutumée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal raises his eyes from a data-slate connected to an augmetic. The augmetic used to be housed inside the skull of Tarzus, the Tech-Priest who perished on your ship.{/n} "My apologies. Nineteen percent of my processing power is engaged in the analysis of my tech-comrade's memory. My response time may be longer than usual."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal lève les yeux vers vous, interrompant sa lecture d'une plaque de données reliée à l'augmétique qui se trouvait précédemment dans le crâne de Tarzus, le technoprêtre ayant trouvé la mort sur votre vaisseau.{/n} « Toutes mes excuses. Dix-neuf pour cent de ma capacité de traitement sont actuellement occupés à analyser la mémoire de mon technoconfrère. Mon temps de réponse pourrait êtrer plus long qu'à l'accoutumée. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal raises his eyes from a data-slate connected to an augmetic. The augmetic used to be housed inside the skull of Tarzus, the Tech-Priest who perished on your ship.{/n} "My apologies. Nineteen percent of my processing power is engaged in the analysis of my tech-comrade's memory. My response time may be longer than usual."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, ogmentlerinden birine bağlı bir databeladan başını kaldırıyor. Bu ogment eskiden, geminde can veren Tarzus'un kafasının içinde bulunuyordu.{/n} "Özürlerimi sunuyorum. İşlem gücümün yüzde on dokuzu, tekno yoldaşımın belleğinin analizine atanmış durumda. Tepki sürem normalden daha uzun olabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal raises his eyes from a data-slate connected to an augmetic. The augmetic used to be housed inside the skull of Tarzus, the Tech-Priest who perished on your ship.{/n} "My apologies. Nineteen percent of my processing power is engaged in the analysis of my tech-comrade's memory. My response time may be longer than usual."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal gözlerini, ogmentlerinden birine bağlı bir databeladan kaldırıyor. Ogment eskiden, geminde telef olan Tarzus'un kafasının içinde bulunuyordu.{/n} "Özürlerimi sunuyorum. İşlem gücümün yüzde on dokuzu tekno yoldaşımın belleğinin analizine atanmış durumda. Tepki sürem normalden daha uzun olabilir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
